title: Couscous with Broccoli and Sun-Dried Tomatoes
directions: Bring the chicken stock to a boil in a large saucepan. Add the couscous, stir and remove from the heat. Cover and let it sit for 5 minutes. Fluff with a fork and place in a serving bowl.

Steam or boil the broccoli for 3 minutes or until just tender. Drain and add to the couscous along with the sun-dried tomatoes, Roma tomatoes, olive oil, garlic, chili sauce, goat cheese, salt and pepper. Toss, garnish with the basil or cilantro and serve warm.
ingredients: 1/4 cup chopped fresh basil or cilantro
